newsitem.title: PHILIPPINES: Manila Central Bank approves bank of Tan Yu Group.
newsitem.headline: Manila Central Bank approves bank of Tan Yu Group.

text.p: The Monetary Board, the policy-making body of the Central Bank, said on Thursday it approved the application of the Tan Yu Group to establish a new commercial bank.
The new bank, to be called PanAsia Banking Inc, has an authorised capital stock of 5 billion pesos. The amount of capital stock proposed to be subscribed and paid up is 1.25 billion pesos.
Tan Yu is one of the richest Filipinos. He is the developer of AsiaWorld City, a reclaimed offshore area in Manila Bay.
